name: CrackCat Kafe
description:
This is your place, your cats, your life. Feed them. Each cat has it's own preference, do not mess this up and you will be fine. Just do your job and keep them full of crack.
WASD to move.

E to interact.

LMB to throw.

Code/Models by HomeXHome.
Cafe interior and project management by Darksandlord.

Elegant Jazz by Hook Sounds on free non-commercial license.
This game was created for SBIGJam.
